mapper.select: select no, title, writer, writeDate, hit from Member order by no desc limit 10
mapper.insert: insert into Member(id, pw, name, gender, birth, tel, email, photo) values (#{id}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birth}, #{tel}, #{email}, #{photo})
mapper.update: update Member set title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer} where no = #{no}
mapper.select: select id from member where id = #{id}
